laboratory_examinations.findings: The CT scan shows bases of the lungs demonstrate atelectasis. The liver is homogeneous with no focal lesions. No intrahepatic biliary dilatation. Common bile duct is prominent measuring 9 mm. The kidneys show a simple cyst (8.6 x 6.6 cm) in the left renal cortex. There is a 7.6 x 8.3 mm focus at the left ureteropelvic junction, likely a stone. Sigmoid colon has a 15 cm loop with wall thickening and an adjacent fluid collection (1.3 x 2.6 cm). Scattered diverticula in the colon. No suspicious lytic or blastic lesions identified.
